snippet.title: Mechabellum [PC] v1.0 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Mechabellum is a sci-fi auto-battler game where players compete with ever-growing armies of mechs, robots, and heavy weapons.

More details here: https://worthplaying.com/game/16966-mechabellum/

Mechabellum is coming to PC (Steam) on September 26, 2024 at $14.99/£14.99/€14.99.

#Mechabellum #videogames #WorthPlaying #WorthPlayingvideos
